original_text: You know your father and his men. They are all strong fighters. They are as dangerous as a mother bear when you take away her babies. Remember that your father has fought many battles. He will not stay all night among his soldiers.
korean_text: 또 후새가 말하되 왕도 아시거니와 왕의 아버지와 그의 추종자들은 용사라 그들은 들에 있는 곰이 새끼를 빼앗긴 것 같이 격분하였고 왕의 부친은 전쟁에 익숙한 사람인즉 백성과 함께 자지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: You know your father and his men.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아버지와 그의 부하들을 알고 있겠지.

sentences.original_text: They are as dangerous as a mother bear
when you take away her babies.
Remember that your father has fought many battles.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아버지가 많은 전투를 싸웠다는 걸 기억해.

sentences.original_text: He will not stay all night among his soldiers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 밤새도록 자기 병사들과 함께 머물지 않을 거야.
